attributes.action: Stop the boats and deport illegal migrants
attributes.additional_details: We want to see the boats stopped, our borders secured and the immediate deportation of all illegal migrants from our country. - Please support and sign this petition to demand action!
attributes.background: The Labour Party pledged to smash the gangs, stop illegal migration and dangerous boat crossings. The British people believe this Government is failing its citizens as numbers are rising at an alarming rate putting pressures on our services and creating civil unrest in our towns and communities.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Deport all illegal migrants in the United Kingdom
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729231
